sentence.Network_en: The council recently drew fire for its intervention in the dispute.
sentence.Network_cn: 委员会最近因为介入该起争端而遭到批评。

sentence.Network_en: He favoured a middle course between free enterprise and state intervention.
sentence.Network_cn: 他更倾向于在自由经营与国家干预之间走一条中庸之道。

sentence.Network_en: That does not require "massive" military intervention, as some have mischievously claimed.
sentence.Network_cn: 那并不需要像某些不怀好意者所主张的那样进行“大规模的”军事干预。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 珍妮佛·提莉_百度百科 ... 不可想象/ Inconceivable 干涉（intervention）/ Intervention 莎拉的启发/ The Initiation of Sarah.
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... intervene 干涉 intervention 介入 interview 晤面.
Blog of You to Work ... 480、Intermediate goods 中间产品 482、Intervention 干预 484、Invention 发明.
石油英语词汇(I4)_专业词汇_专业英语_食品伙伴网 ... intervening well 插入井 intervention 调停 interview 会面；访问.

list.abs: 会计词汇D ... Market intervention 市场干预 State intervention 国家干预 Administrative interference 行政干预.
危机干预（crisis intervention）就是从心理上解决迫在眉睫的危机状况，使症状得到立即缓解和持久的消失，使心理功能恢复到危机前 …
行政干预(administrative intervention)行政干预是指国家政府机构运用行政权力对市场、企业和有关经济活动所进行的超经济行政强制。在市场经济条件下,行政干预应减少到最.
医学制药英语词汇... ... surgical insanity 手术后精神病 surgical intervention 外科手术 surgical oncology 肿瘤外科.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin interventio(n-), from the verb intervenire (see intervene)

entry.def: Intervention is the act of intervening in a situation.

example.ex: ...the role of the United States and its intervention in the internal affairs of many countries.
example.tran: 美国扮演的角色以及其对多国内政的干涉

means.word_mean: 1. the act of intervening (as to mediate a dispute)
2. a policy of intervening in the affairs of other countries

3. (law) a proceeding that permits a person to enter into a lawsuit already in progress; admission of person not an original party to the suit so that person can protect some right or interest that is allegedly affected by the proceedings;

sentences.sentence: "the purpose of intervention is to prevent unnecessary duplication of lawsuits"

auth_sentence.content: Early intervention is essential for those with eating disorders.
auth_sentence.res_content: Early intervention is essential for those with eating disorders.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Early intervention is essential for those with eating disorders.

auth_sentence.content: Even then, public tolerance strictly limited government intervention.
auth_sentence.res_content: Even then, public tolerance strictly limited government intervention.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Even then, public tolerance strictly limited government intervention.

auth_sentence.content: I prefer to have my say without Government intervention.
auth_sentence.res_content: I prefer to have my say without Government intervention.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I prefer to have my say without Government intervention.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 重大的,重要的,多变故的
stems_affixes.word_buile: event[n.事件,事情]+ful充满……的→事件多→多变故的
event[n.事件,事情]+ual……的→出事之后[最终]的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 善于发明或创造的,有发明或创造才能的
stems_affixes.word_buile: invent[v.发明,创造;捏造,虚构]+ive……的→adj.善于发明或创造的,有发明或创造才能的
prevent[v.[from]预防,防止,阻止,制止,妨碍]+ive……的→adj.预防性的
eventual[adj.最后的,结局的,最终的]+ly表副词→adv.最后, 终于
eventual最终的+ity表名词→最终可能发生的
inter之间+vent走+ion表名词→走在二者之间→干涉
invent发明,创造+ion表名词→n.发明, 创造
convention集会;习俗+ality表名词→n.陈规陋习,因袭传统
vent风→v.发泄[情绪],开孔 n.孔,口
ventilate[v.使通风;给…装通风设备]+ion表名词→n.通风
vent风→v.发泄[情绪],开孔 n.孔,口
vent风+ilate=ate表动词→v.使通风;给…装通风设备

Sentence.sentence: Avoiding too much intervention in their children's education.
He cut back only after a full-scale family intervention (干预), in which relatives told him he'd gained weight.

Scholars will debate which interventions this time - the Federal Reserve's support of a failing credit system, guarantees of bank debt, Obama's ''stimulus" plan and bank "stress test" - counted most in preventing a recurrence.
Without intervention they will be a headache to the nation.

means.word_mean: 介入, 干涉, 干预

sentences.en: The government's intervention in this dispute will not help.
sentences.cn: 政府对这场争论的干预不会起作用。

jushi.english: He believes in state intervention in the economy .
jushi.chinese: 他相信,国家有必要对经济进行干预。

jushi.english: Repeated interventions on the currency markets have failed to prevent the value of the currency falling.
jushi.chinese: 屡次对货币市场进行干预,但未能阻止货币价值下跌。

jushi.english: His intervention brought their quarrel to a climax.
jushi.chinese: 他的介入使他们的争吵达到高潮。
